channel.title: CVE Feed for Excellent Infotek Corporation -- e-document system
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Excellent Infotek Corporation -- e-document system

item.title: CVE-2021-22859|2024-08-03T18:51:07.474Z -- excellent%20infotek%20corporation -- e-document%20system
item.description: The users’ data querying function of EIC e-document system does not filter the special characters which resulted in remote attackers can inject SQL syntax and execute arbitrary commands without privilege.

item.title: CVE-2021-22860|2024-08-03T18:51:07.538Z -- excellent%20infotek%20corporation -- e-document%20system
item.description: EIC e-document system does not perform completed identity verification for sorting and filtering personnel data. The vulnerability allows remote attacker to obtain users’ credential information without logging in the system, and further acquire the privileged permissions and execute arbitrary commends.
